pull.title: bitcoin-tx: Use constant for n pubkeys check
pull.body: Use the constant for the maximum number of public keys in a multisig script defined in script/script.h instead of hardcoding it.

events.message:
bitcoin-tx: Use constant for n pubkeys check

Use the constant for the maximum number of public keys in a multisig
script defined in script/script.h instead of hardcoding it.

events.body: Semi related, but this limit could use a test: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/test/multisig_tests.cpp
